response.overview: Fox Racing’s Air Raid is a mid-1990s action sports short film and VHS release from Fox that expanded the brand’s iconic motocross videos into a high-energy, multi-discipline action montage. Like Terrafirma, Air Raid blends dirt-bike riding with BMX and other extreme sports segments—including wakeboarding, surfing, skateboarding and snowboarding—showcasing riders like BMX greats alongside motocross action in raw, crowd-pleasing edits set to the era’s music and cultural vibe. The film captures freestyle jumps, trail riding, and tricks across varied terrains, reflecting the cross-training culture and adrenaline-driven lifestyle of 90s action sports enthusiasts.
response.tagline: The Most Awesome Display of Aerial Firepower Ever Seen!
response.title: Air Raid
